mapper.insert: insert into vote values (seq_vote.nextval, #{title}, #{contents}, sysdate, to_date(#{enddateS}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{voteoption},#{item1},#{item2},#{item3},#{item4},#{item5},0,0,0,0,0,#{memberkey},#{projectkey})
mapper.update: update vote set voteItem1=#{voteItem1}, voteItem2 =#{voteItem2}, voteItem3 =#{voteItem3}, voteItem4 =#{voteItem4}, voteItem5 =#{voteItem5} where votekey=#{votekey}
